USE datasciencegp052024;
GO

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE business.dim_tienda
GO

-----CREATE TIENDA DIM TABLE
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.dim_tienda
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/gold/info_tienda/dim_tienda/',
     DATA_SOURCE = UPExternalDataSource1,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )  
 AS
 SELECT
 CAST(t.cod_tienda as NVARCHAR) as ID_TIENDA,
 CAST(t.Tienda as NVARCHAR) as Nombre_tienda
 FROM business.sat_tienda t
GO

SELECT * FROM business.dim_tienda
GO

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE business.dim_cliente
GO
-----CREATE CLIENTE DIM TABLE
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.dim_cliente
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/gold/info_cliente/dim_cliente/',
     DATA_SOURCE = UPExternalDataSource1,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )  
 AS
 SELECT
 CAST(c.cod_cliente as NVARCHAR) as ID_CLIENTE,
 CAST(c.nombre_cliente as NVARCHAR) as Nombre_Cliente
 FROM business.sat_clientes c
GO

SELECT * FROM business.dim_cliente
GO

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE business.dim_embarque
GO

-----CREATE EMBARQUE DIM TABLE
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.dim_embarque
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/gold/info_embarque/dim_embarque/',
     DATA_SOURCE = UPExternalDataSource1,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )  
 AS
 SELECT
 CAST(e.numero_embarque as NVARCHAR) as ID_EMBARQUE,
 CAST(e.numero_guia as NVARCHAR) as Numero_Guia,
 CAST(e.numero_warehouse as NVARCHAR) as Numero_Warehouse
 FROM business.sat_Embarque e
GO

SELECT * FROM business.dim_embarque
GO



---CREATE FACT EXTERNAL TABLE
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business.fact_detalle_embarque
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/gold/info_embarque/fact_embarque/',
    DATA_SOURCE = UPExternalDataSource1,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
)
AS
 SELECT TOP 10
 CAST(e.numero_warehouse as NVARCHAR) as Numero_Warehouse,
 CAST(c.cod_cliente as NVARCHAR) as ID_CLIENTE,
 CAST(t.cod_tienda as NVARCHAR) as ID_TIENDA,
 CAST(d.nombre_consignado as NVARCHAR) as Nombre_Consignado,
 CAST(d.tipo_paquete as NVARCHAR) as Tipo_Paquete,
 CAST(d.peso_usa as NVARCHAR) as Peso,
 CAST(d.estado as NVARCHAR) as Estado,
 CAST(d.fecha_registro_usa as NVARCHAR) as Fecha_Entrega,
 CAST(d.valor as NVARCHAR) as Precio_Total
FROM business.sat_Det_Embarque d, business.sat_embarque e, business.sat_tienda t, business.sat_clientes c
GO


SELECT * FROM business.sat_Det_Embarque
GO
